title: Private Furnished Bedroom For 1 Person on Quiet Ardmore Street
description:
A charming residence in popular Ardmore Park, this beautiful Cape Cod twin is ideally situated in the heart of a quiet street, with a room becoming available to rent on April 25, 2022. I am looking for a reliable tenant to rent out the middle bedroom of my 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom Ardmore home located on a quiet but wonderfully walkable street only 6 blocks to town center with easy driveway and street parking. (1 person only, no couples or pets due to local occupancy laws and housemate pet allergy).  The house and room are already fully furnished. The bedroom has a queen bed and 2 solid wood dressers. The living room features leather couch, large marble tables and a 65 inch TV. The kitchen features a Hitchcock kitchen table, stove, refrigerator, garbage disposal and dish washer. Your lease includes use of a washer and dryer unit in the basement. I have bedroom furniture available if you need it as well.
There is one full bathroom upstairs and one downstairs. The middle bedroom is 110 square feet and includes a closet. The two other tenants you would be living with are: (James (32), an EMT Haverford College grad Class of 2012 and Suli (34), a server at Teca. Utilities (electric, gas, water and internet) are split evenly between the three tenants (relatively low due to the home's newer efficient boiler, insulation throughout, brand new Marvin Elevate fiberglass windows and a brand-new Provia Signet fiberglass front entry door). There is a nice private back yard and full-size furnished deck. Parking is never an issue with the home's long driveway and plenty of off-street parking. The street itself is very pleasant, scenic and quiet, mostly populated by families and young couples. Having a few guests over for dinner is fine but wild house parties certainly are not allowed, and so are significant others that are “always there” (guests allowed overnight max 5 nights/month unless permitted by other tenants). Because the house is occupied by courteous roommates and surrounded by families, drunken loud-at-2AM party people need not apply! The house is kept reasonably clean (but not to the point of total neat freak) so we need someone who is willing to do their fair share of the cleaning on a regular basis. Tenants also responsible for shoveling snow and are expected to do their part to keep the driveway and walkways clear. The location of the home is excellent with everything the prestigious Ardmore, Main Line and Lower Merion area has to offer. Living in this home, you can enjoy a short 7-block walk to the train station where you can get into center city in less than 20 minutes. The majority of the town's shopping, nightlife and restaurants are less than a mile away, featuring Suburban Square (7 blocks), Carlino's Specialty Italian Foods (3 blocks), Tired Hands Brewery (8 blocks) and the great township parks. The home boasts a great central location, with an easy commute to: Center City Philadelphia: 10 miles, (Manayunk /Roxborough:5 miles) (Villanova University: 4 miles) (Saint Joes: 4 Miles) (Cabrini & Eastern: 6 miles) (Bryn Mawr and Haverford College: 2miles) (Radnor: 6 miles) (Wayne: 7 Miles) (Devon: 9 miles) (Berwyn: 10 miles) (Paoli and Malvern: 12 miles) (Havertown: 1 Mile) (West Chester: 18 miles) (King of Prussia: 10 miles)
MONTHLY ROOM PRICE = $689 + 1/3 utilities
*Minimum 3-Month lease required, along with first/last month’s rent and a security deposit equal to one month's rent. Annual rent increase will never exceed the rate of inflation (CPI).
$2,067  = Initial Payment/Room Deposit = First and Last month's rent + $689 security deposit. ( $689+ $689 + $689)
Professionals: Another benefit to living in Ardmore is that there is NO LOCAL WAGE TAX.
Please send an email for further inquiry.
PLEASE NOTE: All those wishing to apply after viewing the property must pass a check of their credit, criminal background and eviction history, just as past tenants have. After you pay the application fee ($35), your keys will be given to you once the initial payment is received and processed.

Welcome to 6940 Sherwood Rd! Tucked right next to City Avenue in Overbrook Farms, this 4 bedroom / 3.5 bathroom home is bursting with character! Fantastic features include hardwood floors, a GORGEOUS kitchen, high ceilings, 2 fireplaces, lots of storage space, a huge yard, a screened-in sunroom, a long driveway with room for multiple cars, a shed out back and a front porch with classic white pillars – an impressive face on this gorgeous home. The finished basement is a cozy, carpeted space, with a full bathroom and laundry room attached. The primary bedroom is one of the larger, street side rooms, and offers a full bathroom with glass shower stall, and access to the finished attic. Welcome to 840 Mercer St! This gorgeous 3 bedroom / 1 bathroom single family home offers two floors of hardwood floors and contemporary finishes right in the heart of Fishtown! Your front door opens directly into your spacious living / dining room with a vibrant blue accent wall and large street side windows that provide gorgeous natural lighting. The kitchen is charming, with white cabinetry for storage, tile backsplash, contemporary lighting fixtures, and access to the back patio. Head upstairs to view your three bedrooms and full bathroom. The hallway stretches the length of the upper level, showcasing a lovely banister and hardwood flooring. Each bedroom offers windows for natural sunlight and ample closet space. Continue into your full bathroom with fun, colorful tiling and a shower / tub combo with glass door. This incredible home won’t last long – call us today!

title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Sauna, Near Shopping
description:
The home at 2315 is a 575 square foot one bedroom one bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. The bathroom is also renovated. This home features neutral carpet to go with any decor well. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Most of the large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One of the windows in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a view of the park. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table from Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
*  24/7 top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 On-site Maintenance
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Large closets
* Large windows
* Carpet
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Call Jocelyn  show contact info
x122 or Michelle at  show contact info
x129 to schedule an appointment to tour. Please note that an appointment is required to tour at this time. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!

201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: Amazing Triplex with Common Outdoor Space - Early July
description:
Available early July:
Welcome to 1647 Germantown Ave #3! Located on the third floor of a triplex in Kensington, this sun-soaked 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment offers hardwood floors & recessed lighting throughout. Enter into the bright and spacious common area boasting high ceilings and a straight-through layout. There is ample room for different living room and dining room set ups, and the kitchen is separated from the common area with counter seating. Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #204 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. description: Welcome to East Kensington! Top-quality finishes and too many features to detail. This home has 3 bedrooms and 3 full beautiful bathrooms. Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
